excerpt: I had some free time at Shapers and started this little game, though soon I was over my head in work and had to finish it at home. Luckily I have a very patient girlfriend (who happened to create the sounds for this game).
title: sheep
content: I had some free time at Shapers and started this little game, though soon I was over my head in work and had to finish it at home. Luckily I have a very patient girlfriend (who happened to create the sounds for this game).
